title: Same User, Same Region
body:
So towards the end of July, I will be moving to North America for 5 months. Obviously I would still like to play LoL while I'm over there. I know I'll have to change my region server, but what I've realised is that there is a player in NA with the same username as me.

I'm wondering what will happen. Will I have to make a new account? Change my user? Or just continue as normal?

replies.body: You will be asked to change your summoner name when you log in for the first time on the region you transferred to.
